== Ubuntu resources on Internet social networks ==
There are many Ubuntu resources on social network found on the Internet. These social networks can assist people interested in Ubuntu to interact in different ways.

* <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2205498133|Facebook]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://groups.myspace.com/ubuntu4all|MySpace]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.orkut.com/Community.aspx?cmm=426786|Orkut]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.last.fm/group/Ubuntu+Linux|last.fm]]</nowiki>: A social network specializing in music. Learn what fellow Ubuntu users are listening to.
* <nowiki>[[http://pulseofubuntu.tweetpeek.com/|Pulse of Ubuntu]]</nowiki>: A feed of postings for Ubuntu Users using <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com|Twitter]]</nowiki>.
 
Other Networks
* <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.com/|Planet Ubuntu]]</nowiki>: A aggregate of Ubuntu Members blogs.
